title: "Rafael Bassi Stern"

I am an Assistant Professor at the
Federal University of Sao Carlos.
I have a B.A. in statistics from
University of Sao Paulo, 
a B.A. in law from 
Pontificia Universidade Catolica in Sao Paulo, and
a Ph.D. in statistics from 
Carnegie Mellon University.
I am currently a member of the
Scientific Council of the
Brazilian Association of Jurimetrics and
an associate investigator at NeuroMat.

## Research interests

- Bayesian Inference
- Computational Historical Linguistics
- Decision Theory
- Jurimetrics (applications of statistics to law)
- Machine Learning
